title: Congming Lun Wen Xu
synopsis: In the heavenly court, Wen Quxing was blown with anger and staring at the book boy he did not grow into—only a slap-sized fairy. Duan Yan is naughty and naughty by nature, but he is greedy and playful but has no ambitions, careless and reckless, reckless and forgetful, and accidentally leaves a "poetry pill" of Wenquxing in the world. Angrily, Wen Quxing lowered Duan Yan into the mortal world to find "Shi Dan", and at the same time let him see how a poor child became the champion in the future. In the process of searching for "Shi Dan" in the world, Duan Yan and Lun Wenxu did not know each other, and the two became inseparable friends. (translated from iqiyi)
